snippet.title: Puyo Puyo Puzzle Pop - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Enjoy Puyo Puyo matches anytime, anywhere in single-player and multiplayer modes! Join 24 Puyo Puyo characters (including series newcomers) in a brand-new story featuring full voiceovers. Puyo Puyo Puzzle Pop arrives on April 4th exclusively on Apple Arcade!​

https://apple.co/puyopuyo-us

https://x.com/SEGA
https://www.facebook.com/SEGA/
https://www.instagram.com/sega/
https://www.tiktok.com/@sega_west
